title: Leaverbuster
body: my internet was lagging out constantly last night then i called verizon who supposedly fixed it then i started another game half an hour later and lagged out in champ select then i got a 20 minute leave buster

replies.body: Hopefully your ISP has improved since then.  :(  A [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) would occur after more than one game, so it sounds like the issues triggered it.  Even though it's not intentional, it's still going to treat all players equally.  Let me know if you have any questions!
